member.summary: Reprensents a company

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.Company.Name
member.summary: Name of the company

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.Company.VAT
member.summary: VAT of the company (international vat number)

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.Company.NationalIdentityNumber
member.summary: National identity number of the company https://impotsdirects.public.lu/fr/az/n/num__ro_dossier.html Le numéro d’identification nationale luxembourgois des personnes morales (PM) est également connu sous le nom de «matricule» ou «numéro d’identification personnelle» à 11 positions. En ce qui concerne les impôts directs, ce « matricule » peut également servir de numéro d'identification fiscale (NIF ou TIN, tax identification number). Sa structure reprend l’année de constitution et la forme juridique de la personne morale. Les cinq derniers chiffres sont aléatoires AAAA FF XX XXX. Ce numéro de dossier à 11 chiffres est à indiquer dans tous les rapports avec les bureau compétents de L'ACD.

member.summary: Address of the company headquarters
member.example: 89A Parc d'Activités Capellen rue Pafebruch L-8308 Capellen Luxembourg

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.VehicleInsuranceCoverTypes.Liability
member.summary: Liability
member.remarks: Automobile liability insurance is financial protection for a driver who, while operating a vehicle, harms someone else or their property. Automobile liability insurance only covers injuries or damages to third parties and their property, not to the driver or the driver’s property. The two components of automobile liability insurance are bodily injury liability and property damage liability. Automobile liability insurance does not have a deductible.

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.VehicleInsuranceCoverTypes.Glass
member.summary: Glass coverage
member.remarks: Full glass coverage may be added to allow for glass coverage without a deductible. In some cases, such as with windshield damage, the comprehensive deductible may be waived if the glass is repaired instead of replaced.

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.VehicleInsuranceCoverTypes.Theft
member.summary: Teft coverage

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.VehicleInsuranceCoverTypes.Replacement
member.summary: Replacement coverage
member.remarks: Can be car replacement, or phone replacement

member.summary: Assistance coverage

member.name: T:AssurBox.SDK.DTO.Policy
member.summary: In insurance, the insurance policy is a contract between the insurer and the insured, known as the policyholder, which determines the claims which the insurer is legally required to pay. In exchange for an initial payment, known as the premium, the insurer promises to pay for loss caused by perils covered under the policy language.

Fuel types :
Value Description
0 Undefined
2 LPG
3 Electrique
4 Essence LPG
5 Essence CNG
6 Diesel
7 Gaz naturel comprimé
8 Essence
9 Hybride Essence Elec NOVC
10 Essence Methane
11 Hybride Essence Elec OVC
12 Hybride essence electricite
13 Hybride diesel electricite NOVC
14 Hybride essence ethanol
15 Hybride diesel electricite OVC

member.summary: Well-known names and values used in AssurBox receivers and handlers

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxConstants.ReceiverName
member.summary: Gets the name of the AssurBox WebHook receiver.

member.name: T:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook
member.summary: Base class for AssurBox WebHooks Describes one or more event notifications received as an Outbound Message from AssurBox. For details about AssurBox's Outbound Messages, see http://assurbox.net/webhooks/.

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique ID for this alert.

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the alert.

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets a description of the alert.

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.TimeStamp
member.summary: The time the webhook was sent (UTC based)

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.TransmissionAttemptCount
member.summary: Number of attempt to send data

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.ResourceType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the impacted resource. (eg : Green card request)

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.CorrelationId
member.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the resource.
member.remarks: Reference key for communication between AssurBox and other APIs This represents the whole file (ex : the whole green card request)

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.MessageId
member.summary: Identifier for this specific message

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.RessourceLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a direct link to the resource on the AssurBox Api.

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.AssurBoxWebHook.Requester
member.summary: Gets or sets the Organization originating this Outbound Message.

member.name: T:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotification
member.summary: Describes one or more event notifications received as an Outbound Message from AssurBox. For details about AssurBox's Outbound Messages, see http://assurbox.net/webhooks/.

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotification.NotificationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of communication

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotification.LicencePlate
member.summary: The vehicle licence plate (Must respect LU formats : 2 letters + 4 numbers, 4 numbers or 5 numbers)

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotification.VIN
member.summary: The Vehicle Identification Number (must be valid : alphanumeric : between 3 and 17 characters, no I,O,Q)

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotification.Communication
member.summary: A commmunication for the receiver

member.name: P:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotification.EffectiveDate
member.summary: Date on which the green card should be effective

member.name: T:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes
member.summary: Type of notification for a green card request notification

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes.InitialRequest
member.summary: Initialization, very first request

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes.Modification
member.summary: Modification, if the first request had a small error

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes.Cancelation
member.summary: Delete/Cancel, if the first request was wrong, or if the green card is not required anymore

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes.Retry
member.summary: Retry, if no answer was provided in an acceptable time frame

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes.Response
member.summary: Response, to the requester

member.name: F:AssurBox.SDK.WebHooks.GreenCardRequestNotificationTypes.Rejection
member.summary: Rejection, if the request cannot be fullfiled by the insurance.
member.remarks: A reason for rejection is expected in the field.
